With a roll of 14 on your D20, Lirael coordinates a focused attack with the Esterosian fighters, targeting the remaining severely wounded melee cultist. The combined efforts of Lirael and the fighters prove successful, dealing an additional 3 points of damage. The cultist, overwhelmed by the onslaught, succumbs to their injuries and falls to the ground, defeated.

Current combat situation:

* Cultist 1 (disrupted spellcaster): Defeated
* Cultist 2 (spellcaster): Defeated
* Cultist 3 (melee): Engaged with Dragonborn warriors, severely wounded and restrained
* Cultist 4 (melee): Defeated
* Cultist 5 (melee): Defeated

Allies:

* Lirael: Unharmed
* Dragonborn warriors: Slightly wounded
* Esterosian mage: Unharmed
* Esterosian fighters: Slightly wounded

The remaining enemies have been defeated or restrained. Now would be a good time to gather information or tend to the wounded.

What will you do next, Lirael?

A. Attempt to interrogate the captured cultist, hoping to force them to reveal information about their plans. (Roll an Intimidation check using a D20, adding your Charisma modifier.)
B. Keep an eye out for any additional threats that may be lurking nearby. (Roll a Perception check using a D20, adding your Wisdom modifier.)
C. Assess the overall state of your allies, ensuring their well-being. (Roll a Medicine check using a D20, adding your Wisdom modifier.)
D. Search the defeated cultists for any useful items, information, or evidence. (Roll an Investigation check using a D20, adding your Intelligence modifier.)
E. Secure the area, making sure the dark ritual cannot be completed by any remaining cultists or reinforcements. (Roll a Survival check using a D20, adding your Wisdom modifier.)
